/*TEMPLATE
PARAMETER ID[query:id:int]
*/


SELECT *, (
    SELECT abc
    FROM T2
    WHERE 1=2
) as abc FROM T1
WHERE 1=1
#set($valueSet = 123)
#if($Has.ID)
AND ID = $ID
#end

#foreach($column in $Unsafe.Columns)
    $column.Id
#end

#if($Has.quantity)
AND quantity = $quantity
AND quantity = $Unsafe.quantity
#end
